person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Yeltsin has been shown a few times on television since his quintuple bypass on November 5 but has yet to deliver any major television or radio address to the nation .

1. "Yeltsin" is mentioned in the paragraph.
2. "His" in "his quintuple bypass" refers back to Yeltsin, indicating that he is the person who underwent the surgery.
3. There are no other clear person entities mentioned in the paragraph.

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

* Yeltsin
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
